isp_info.isp_name: < Lebitso le ISP > - umhlinzeki wemisebenti ye-inthanethi
isp_info.isp_address: Ligama leligwa le-10, lidolobha kanye nekhowudi yeposi njll.

inputUsername_placeholder: -- uma ufaka i-Login khumbula izinhlamvu ezinkhulu nezincane --
inputPassword_placeholder: -- uma ufaka i-Phasiwedi khumbula izinhlamvu ezinkhulu nezincane --
anon_pretext1: Kutsi umtsetfo wakho ube nengena bese uthola ukufinyelela ku-Inthanethi, chofoza Ngena. Ukuxhumana kuzoqhubeka emahoreni la-12 uma umtsetfo ungasebentiswa.
status_pretext1: Umtsetfo wakho ubelengene bese uthola ukufinyelela ku-Inthanethi. Ukuxhumana kuzoqhubeka kusukela esikhathini esimiswe ngabaphatsi benethiwekhi kuye ngokusetjentiswa komtsetfo.
status_pretext2: Nangabe ufuna kuphuma kulekuxhumana wedwa, chofoza PHUMA.
noscript: Sikhumbuzo: Kutsi ungene ngempumelelo ohlelweni, iJavaScript ebrawuza yakho kufanele ivuleke.
cp_portal_info: Ukufinyelela ku-Inthanethi enethwekhi ye-<Lebitso le ISP> kudinga i-login kanye nephasiwedi. Khumbula kutsi i-login nephasiwedi kufanele kuvikelwe umsebenzisi kusukela ekulahlekelweni noma ukufinyelela ngabanye.
cp_portal_cookies_note: Luhlelo lokuNgena lusebenzisa ama-cookies kugcina imininingwane kukhompyutha yakho. Ama-cookies asetjentiswa kutsi anike imisebenti lebekelwe phezulu, kuhlanganisa nemisebenti lebekelwe umsebenzisi ngamunye. Ukuqhubeka usebenzisa leli portal ngaphandle kwekushintja kusetjentiswa kwama-cookies kusho kutsi azobe afakwe kutisetfo sakho.
cp_session_timeout_content:
Isikhatsi lesinikwe ukufinyelela ku-inthanethi siphelile, ngako-ke uxhumano luphelile.
Ungakwenta njani?
  • Kutsi uqhubeke usebenzisa inthanethi, hlola kutsi kungenzeka yini kutfutfukiswa kwesikhatsi sokufinyelela noma uthenge lesinye sikhatsi.
  • Uma uneminye imibuto, kuhle ukuxhumana ne inhlangano yetekhnoloji.
cp_error_info:
• Kusetjentiswe ligama lomsebenzisi noma iphasiwedi lelingelona
  • Khibhodi inecaps lock etholakele Caps Lock
  • Khompyutha lehlukile isebentisa i-akhawunti yakho
  • I-akhawunti yakho ivaliwe yinhlelo ngenxa yomsebenti longalungile wemtsetfo wakho
  • I-akhawunti yakho iphelile noma isuswe ngenxa yokungakhokhi imali yesikhwama
cp_error_solution:
• Bheka kutsi ufaka kahle ligama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi (gcina izinhlamvu ezinkhulu nezincane ngendlela efanele)
  • Bheka kutsi i-akhawunti yakho ikhokhiwe
  • Uma inkinga ingahambelani nalokuphezulu, xhumana nebhodi lenethiwekhi
cp_rules_content:
1. Imigomo ibhalwe nge-HTML ejwayelekile

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin nibh augue, suscipit a, scelerisque sed, lacinia in, mi. Cras vel lorem. Etiam pellentesque aliquet tellus. Phasellus pharetra nulla ac diam. Quisque semper justo at risus. Donec venenatis, turpis vel hendrerit interdum, dui ligula ultricies purus, sed posuere libero dui id orci. Nam congue, pede vitae dapibus aliquet, elit magna vulputate arcu, vel tempus metus leo non est. Etiam sit amet lectus quis est congue mollis. Phasellus congue lacus eget neque. Phasellus ornare, ante vitae consectetuer consequat, purus sapien ultricies dolor, et mollis pede metus eget nisi. Praesent sodales velit quis augue. Cras suscipit, urna at aliquam rhoncus, urna quam viverra nisi, in interdum massa nibh nec erat.
cp_login_attempt_content: Luhlelo luvumela ukuphindza %s kwemizamo lokungalungile yokungena. Uma lidlula inani lezemzamo, kuNgena kuvalwa ngesikhatsi se %s %s.

⇧ Shift (left)
+ ⌥ Alt (left)
+ litera

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + U
gxila kunkambu yeLigama lomsebenzisi

a11y-lang-keys_data-content:
Bamba ⇧ Shift (left) bese ucindezela titsatfu temalitere ekhukhi yekhodi lolulimi (ISO 639-1) ngasikhatsi noma kuphindze kube yinye ngemuva kwesinye.

Emibonelo:
⇧ Shift + P + L → guqula lulwimi lwesiPolishi (pl)

⇧ Shift + E + N → guqula lulwimi lwesiNgisi (en)

⇧ Shift + D + E → guqula lulwimi lwesiJalimane (de)

⇧ Shift + F + R → guqula lulwimi lwesiFulentshi (fr)

⇧ Shift + E + S → guqula lulwimi lwesiSpanishi (es)

⇧ Shift + I + T → guqula lulwimi lwesiTaliyane (it)
...
polyglotLanguageSwitcher_data-content: Lapha utawushintja inguqulo lolulwimi lwe-portal. Ngokucindezela %s kukhibhodi, utawuvula sikhala %s noma Shift bese ucindezela titsatfu temalitere yekhodi lolulimi ngasikhatsi noma ngemuva kwesinye, isibonelo: Shift + P + L utawuguqula lulwimi.
fieldUsername_data-content: Lesi sikhala sinekhi yokufinyelela. Ngokucindezela %s ngasikhatsi utawukhetha lesi sikhala %s.
fieldPassword_data-content: Lesi sikhala sinekhi yokufinyelela. Ngokucindezela %s ngasikhatsi utawukhetha lesi sikhala %s.
login-rules_data-content: Lapha utawuqinisekisa kuvuma kwemigomo yekufinyelela ku-Inthanethi njengoba kuchazwe kuMigomo.
cp_portal_event_undefined_data-content: Lapha utawuthola imininingwane ngoxhumano lwemtsetfo wakho.
menuTrigger_data-content: Ngekuchafata ☰ i-hamburger ye-offcanvas noma ngekucindzetela kukhibhodi ngasikhatsi sinye %s utawuvula imenyu yeluhlobo.
about_content:
GuardianSuit yithempulethi yesimanje, lephendvulayo futsi lene-animathini ye-Captive Portal ye-OPNsense. Inika basebentisi lwati lolukhangako lwekungenisa, futsi balawuli ibanika kulawula lokugcwele ekubukekeni nasekusebenteni kwelipheji lekumukela.

Imisebenti lebalulekile:

  • Kuphendvula nemaanimathini.
  • Kusekela tilwimi letinyenti.
  • Kulungisa lula kubukeka nemibala.
  • UX lecacile kanye nekuhambisana ne-WCAG.
  • Kuhlanganiswa kalula ne-OPNsense.

Kusetjentiswa:
Kuhle kakhulu emanethiwekhi etinkampani, emahhotela, emakhefi kanye netinye tindzawo letidzinga lipheji lekumukela le-Captive Portal lelikhangako ngeliso.

Umbhali: Mirosław Majka <mix@proask.pl> | © 2025 GuardianSuit
cookies_content:
Yini ikhukhi?

Emakhukhi (lokubitwa ngekutsi "cookies") ngamafayela lamancane embhalo, lakhiwa ngokuzenzakalela siphequluli se-inthanethi, ngesikhatsi uvakashela emakhasi e-WWW. Lwati lolukuwo lukhukhi lunganconwa kuphela ngelikhasi lapho lelikhukhi livela khona. Ngako-ke, likhasi le-inthanethi alikwati kufinyelela kulamanye emafayela laku-kompyutha yomsebentisi.

Ngenxa yelwati loluku-emakhukhi, likhasi "liyati" kutsi ulisebentisa kanjani futsi lingalungisa kahle lokuboniswa kuwe noma likunike lusito.

Siyawasebentisa ngani emakhukhi?

Esikhatsini selikhasi sisebentisa emakhukhi ethekhinikhali, labalulekile ekusebenteni kahle kwelikhasi. Siwasebentisa kuze silungise kahle likhasi letfu le-inthanethi kuya ngetinsiza netiphequluli letivame kusebentiswa bantfu labalivakashelako – ngaleyo ndlela ikhompyutha yakho, ithebhulethi noma ifoni yakho itawulibonisa kahle futsi kucace, ikhumbula kutsi uyemukele yini kuboniswa kwalokunye lokuqukethwe kulikhasi le-inthanethi.

Umsebentisi angeke akhone kuyekela emakhukhi ethekhinikhali.

Sisebentisa sikhatsi lesingakanani emakhukhi?

Sisebentisa lokubitwa ngekutsi emakhukhi lamile (persistent cookies), lahlala kudivayisi yakho sikhatsi lesitsite noma kuze kube ngesikhatsi ususwa ngesandla.

Nguluphi lwati lolubutswa ngemakhukhi?

Ngethekhinoloji yemakhukhi sibutsa kuphela lwati lwekusebenta lolungatiwa, lolusetjentiselwa kwenta kube lula kusebentisa likhasi letfu.

Asibutsi nobe nguluphi lwati lolungakukhomba. Lwati lunye kuphela ngomsebentisi, lolungakakhoni kumkhomba ngaphandle kwekuhlanganiswa nalolunye lwati, yikheli ye-IP lapho umsebentisi axhumana khona.
privacy_content:
Senta lomculu wekubhala kuze sikwatise ngeNqubomgomo Yetfu Yebumfihlo. Lapha utawutfola lwati kutsi singubani, sibutsa njani, sisebentisa njani, sikhombisa njani futsi sabelana kanjani ngedatha yemuntfu ngaphansi kwe < Lebitso le ISP >, lenesikhungo e-[ Nazwa ulicy 10, miasto i kod pocztowy ], kutsi sikwenta ngani futsi kutsi bantfu labadatha yabo icubungulwa bangawasebentisa njani emalungelo abo ebuntfwaneni.

< Lebitso le ISP > inomtfwalo wekucubungula idatha yemuntfu ngekuhambisana nalena Nqubomgomo Yebumfihlo.

MAYELANA NATHI

Umphatsi, lokungumuntfu locubungula idatha yemuntfu lehlobene nekusebentisa kwakho lenkonzo, ngu < Lebitso le ISP >, [ Nazwa ulicy 10, miasto i kod pocztowy ]; NIP 1234567890, Regon 123456789,

XHUMANA NATHI
  • nge-elekthroniki kule-imeyili: adres@email.pl,
  • ngalokubhaliwe kulekheli: Lebitso le ISP, [ Nazwa ulicy 10, miasto i kod pocztowy ]
IMIGOMO LEKULE NQUBOOMGOMO YEBUMFIHLO

Siyacinisekisa kutsi kucubungulwa kwedatha yakho kwenteka ngekuhambisana nemigomo yeSimemezelo sePhalamende Yurophu neMkhandlu (EU) namba 2016/679 yanga 27 Mabasa 2016 mayelana nekuvikelwa kwebantfu uma kucubungulwa idatha yemuntfu kanye nekugucuka kwamahhala kwaleyo datha futsi kucishwa kweDirikhithiva 95/46/EC (RODO), umtsetfo wekuvikelwa kwedatha yemuntfu kanye nemigomo leyehlukile. Lena Nqubomgomo Yebumfihlo ilungiswe ngekuhambisana naleyo migomo. Sichaza kahle kutsi sibutsa njani idatha yemuntfu nekutsi isetjentiselwa ini.

Siyacaphela kutsi < Lebitso le ISP > ibutsa idatha yemuntfu kanye nelwati lwenkampani loluniketwa ngemakhasimende ayo (langaba khona) kanye nebahlanganyeli, kanye nedatha letfolwa ngesikhatsi kusetjentiswa insita yekungena ku-inthanethi.

KUBUTSWA KWEDATHA YEMUNTFU

Sibutsa idatha yemuntfu leniketwa basebentisi kulemitfombo lelandzelako:

  • kuniketa tincomo, kumisa imigomo yekubambisana noma/nekutiniketa lwati mayelana netinsita kanye neminye imisebenti ye < Lebitso le ISP >,
  • kungenela nekugcwalisa tinkontileka kanye nekugcina kuchumana nekhasimende/umlingani,
  • kugcwalisa imisebenti lephuma emitsetfweni leyisebentako,
  • kuphawula imibuto, kubuka tikhalo kanye nelunye lusito lwangemuva kwekuthengiswa,
  • imakethe lecondzile (ngaphandle kwe-newsletter),
  • ngemitfombo yekugcina (bufakazi), noma kuze kumiswe, kufunwe noma kuvikelwe etimangalweni.
KUGCINWA KANYE NEKUSUSWA KWEDATHA

Ngenhloso yekuvikela idatha leyetfulwe, silungise imitsetfo yangekhatsi neteluleko letivimbela kudluliselwa kwedatha kubantfu labangenalo lilungelo. Sisebentisa tindlela tethekhinoloji, tetivumelwano, tekuphatsa kanye netemzimba kuvikela idatha ekufinyeleleni lokungagunyatiwe. Silawula kusebenta kwato futsi sihlale sihlola kuhambisana kwato nemitsetfo lefanele.

Siyigcina idatha yemuntfu yomsebentisi kuphela sikhatsi lesidzinga kuze kugcwaliswe tinhloso letabutswa ngato.

KUDLULISWA KANYE NEKUVULELWA KWEDATHA

Asidayisi futsi asiyidlulisi kubantfu besitsatfu idatha yemuntfu yebasebentisi ngaphandle kwemvume yabo. Idatha yebasebentisi ayiprofayilwa.

Kuncika eluhlobeni nasebubanzini bekubambisana emkhatsini womsebentisi ne < Lebitso le ISP >, singadlulisa idatha uma kudzingeka ngemigomo yemtsetfo, noma uma kudzingeka kuze kugcinwe kuhambisana nemisebenti yetemtsetfo, kugcwaliswe tibopho tetivumelwano, kuphendvulwe etimangalweni noma kuvikela emalungelo, impahla noma kuphepha.

IMIGOMO YEKUCUBUNGULA IDATHA YAKHO

Senta konkhe ngekucophelela lokukhulu kuvikela intfo yabantfu labadatha yabo icubungulwa, ikakhulu kuze sicinisekise kutsi idatha:

  • icubungulwa ngekuhambisana nemtsetfo, ngekwetsembeka futsi ngendlela lecacile kumuntfu lotsintfwa yiyo,
  • ibutswa ngenhloso lecondzile, lecacile nalengokomtfwalo futsi ingacubungulwa kabusha ngendlela lengahambisani naleyo nhloso,
  • iyalingana, ifanele futsi ilinganiselwe kulokudzingekako kuze kugcwaliswe tinhloso,
  • ilungile futsi ibuyeketwa uma kudzingeka; sitsatsa tinyatselo kuze idatha lengalungile isuswe noma ilungiswe masinyane,
  • igcinwe ngendlela levumela kukhomba umuntfu kuphela sikhatsi lesidzinga,
  • icubungulwa ngendlela lecinisekisa kuphepha lokwanele, kufaka ekhatsi kuvikela ekucubungulweni lokungagunyatiwe noma lokungekho emtsetfweni kanye nekulahleka noma kuchithwa ngephutsa.

Sivamise kucubungula idatha yakho ngemvume, lengahoxiswa nobe ngunini. Kwezinye timo, kucubungula kudzingekile kuze kugcwaliswe sivumelwano emkhatsini wetfu nawe noma ngekucela kwakho, nangakabi khona sivumelwano. Kukhona netimo lapho kucubungula kudzingeka kugcwaliswe umtfwalo wemthetho losiphocele njengemphatsi wedatha. Lemitfwalo ivela, sibonelo, emitsetfweni yemsebenti noma yomthetho webhuku. Kucubungula kungabuye kudzingeke ngenhloso yetintshisekelo tetfu letisemtsetfweni, njengesibonelo kufuna timangalelo letivela emisebentini yetfu yebhizinisi.

EMALUNGELO AKHO

Unelilungelo lelilandzelako:

  • Kufinyelela kudatha yakho yemuntfu kanye nekutfola lwati mayelana netigaba tedatha, tinhloso tekucubungula kanye nekutfola ikhophi yayo,
  • Kulungisa idatha lengalungile, kugcwalisa lekushodayo kanye nelilungelo lekukhohlwa, lokusho kutsi unelilungelo lekucela kususwa kwedatha lecubungulwa ngaphandle kwesizathu noma lokungekho emtsetfweni,
  • Kuhoxisa imvume yekucubungula nobe ngunini ngaphandle kwekuphazamisa kusemthethweni kwekucubungula lokwenteka ngaphambi kwekuhoxiswa (uma kucubungula kusekelwe ku-athikhili 6 sigaba 1 lit. a noma athikhili 9 sigaba 2 lit. a RODO).
COOKIES

< Lebitso le ISP > isebentisa emakhukhi kuze yente kube lula kusebentisa insita. Ngekusebentisa insita uyavuma kusebentiswa kwemakhukhi ngitsi. Uma ungawavimbi, uyavuma kusebentiswa kwawo kanye nekugcinwa kwawo kudivayisi yakho.

INGUCOLO YENQUBOMGOMO YEKUVIKELWA KWEDATHA

< Lebitso le ISP > igcina lilungelo lekutfutsa tingucuko kunqubomgomo yekuvikelwa kwedatha yemuntfu, lokungatsintfwa kutfutfuka kwetekhinoloji ye-inthanethi, tingucuko temtsetfo noma kutfutfuka kwensita. Ngetingucuko tonkhe sitawukwatisa ngendlela lecacile nelula kuyivisisa.

Yonke imibuto mayelana nenqubomgomo yekuvikelwa kwedatha sicela uyitfumele kule-imeyili: adres@email.pl
